original: Forsbeck, Ivar Samuel, grosshandlare, Skänninge, f. 4/8/80 i Bälaryds s :ii, Jönköp. 1., av grosshandl. Samuel F. o. Hulda Gustafsson. G. 12 m. Stella Erdeman. Barn: Inga-Maja f. 15, g. m. komm :’borgmäst. Thord Österman, Skänninge, Sam 22, kamr. i faderns föret. — Genomg. handisk. In-neh. spannmålsfirman S. Forsbeck i Skänninge. Ordf. i östergötl. o. Södermani. spannm :handl :fören., v. ordf. i Riksfören. av Sv:es spannm :-intressenter o. i Sv. fröengr :fören., led. av sv. skiljend, led. av stadsfullm. •sed. 11, v. ordf. 17-23 o. 31, ordf. 47, v. ordf. i styr. f. komm. mellansk. fr. 17, ordf. fr. 39, led. av kyrkofullm. fr. 37 o. av drätselkamm. 12-31 o. fr. 34, v. ordf. 17-23, ordf. 24-31, gruppchef i hemv. Skyttem. i guld.
translated: Forsbeck, Ivar Samuel, merchant, Skänninge, b. 4/8/80 in Bälaryds s: ii, Jönköping County, son of merchant Samuel F. and Hulda Gustafsson. Married 12/XX to Stella Erdeman. Children: Inga-Maja b. 15, married to Mayor Thord Österman, Skänninge, Sam 22, colleague in father's company - Owner of the grain trading company S. Forsbeck in Skänninge. Chairman of the grain trading associations in Östergötland and Södermanland, vice chairman of the National Association of Swedish grain interests and the Swedish seed growers association, member of the Swedish Arbitration Association, member of the city council since 1911, vice chairman 1917-1923 and 1931, chairman 1947, vice chairman of the board of the inter-municipal communication company from 1917, chairman from 1939, member of the church council from 1937 and of the finance committee from 1912-1931 and from 1934, vice chairman 1917-1923, chairman 1924-1931, and group leader in the Home Guard shooting team in gold.

memberOf.name: National Association of Swedish Grain Interests
